text: The Garth Brooks Collection is the first compilation album of American country pop artist Garth Brooks. It was released on September 2, 1994 (see 1994 in country music) and contains ten of Brooks' favorite songs, including his debut single, "Much Too Young (To Feel This Damn Old)". ==Track listings== ==Certifications== ==References== Category:Garth Brooks compilation albums Category:1994 compilation albums Category:Capitol Records compilation albums Category:Albums produced by Allen Reynolds
title: The Garth Brooks Collection
